column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////We were staring at the servers
column2: trying to Jedi-mind-trick someone into paying attention to us; but most were standing around in the back
column4: others chatting. I have no objection to any server social time
column5: I was a server for years
column6: I like happy servers and laid back attitude
column7: but this was out right neglect and willful laissez-faire towards customers. (There is a general attitude that they don't give a crap about customers; quantity trumps quality when it comes to how they get their tips and really couldn't care less.)
